data.name: first-block-1
data.value: X Notes allows you to effortlessly organize your notes into folders and categorize them with labels.

data.name: first-block-2
data.value: Experience a clean and intuitive user interface that will inspire you to stay organized and productive.

data.name: first-block-3
data.value: With the feature of simultaneous note and folder editing, you can collaborate with others in real-time, making teamwork seamless and efficient.

data.name: first-block-4
data.value: Sign up now and start exploring all the amazing functionalities of X Notes.

data.name: notes-description
data.value: Stay organized and efficient with X Notes. Save all your notes, whether they're text, photos, audio, videos, or documents.

data.name: folders-description
data.value: Say goodbye to clutter and chaos. With X Notes, you can effortlessly organize your notes into folders, making it a breeze to find what you need when you need it.

data.name: sharing-description
data.value: Collaboration is key to success. With X Notes, you can easily share notes and folders with your friends or team, enabling seamless collaboration and conquering projects together in real time.

data.name: labels-description
data.value: Keep your notes organized and easily accessible with X Notes. Mark notes with labels to categorize them and find what you need in an instant.

data.name: customization-description
data.value: Your note-taking experience should be as unique as you are. With X Notes, customize the interface to your liking and create a workspace that suits your needs.

data.name: related-notes-description
data.value: Tired of flipping through pages to find the information you need? With X Notes, you can add related notes to any note, so you can easily access all the information you need without losing your place.
